snippet.title: Thomas Test \- Physical Therapy Haven
snippet.description: The patient is asked to lie supine. The examiner checks for lordosis which is a predictor of a tight hip flexor. The examiner then flexes one hip bringing the knee ...

snippet.title: Thomas Test \- ExRx.net
snippet.description: Instructions. Preparation. Lie supine on bench with leg extended beyond edge of bench (less than half of thigh on bench). Bring other knee of other leg to chest.
